name: The Light Within (CheesyHills)
description:
"The Light Within" is a game based on promoting kindness and helping others.

You play as a light trapped inside a dark labyrinth. As you wander around finding an exit, you will encounter NPCs that will ask you for a glimmer of hope. These can be found throughout the labyrinth and can be collected by walking into them.

If you don't have collected any glimmers of hope before the interaction, you will lose 2 points from your light. If you have glimmers of hope you will have the option to give them one or not.

If you decide to give them a glimmer of hope, you will receive 5 points of light, otherwise you will lose 5 points of light. Also, while you are trapped in the labyrinth, you will lose 1 point of light every 30 seconds.

To control the player, use W, A, S, D to move and the mouse to look around

To pause the game press Escape or P
